The PDE editor had stopped processing menu entries (I was trying to add new extensions) and so I shut it down, reopened and edited manually when I got this
Can you reproduce? Not much we can do if a 'null' document is passed to us. Moving to PDE for further investigation.
Sorry Dani - the problem worked itself out when I restarted
since this isn't reproducible, and falls under the 'act of god' clause, should we close this Wassim?
I actually looked into that and could not figure out how we could ever end up with a 'null' document.

You may want to close it as REMIND until we can get a replicable case as people searching on it might find it if they get it too. I suspect God has greater concerns than the save function of your editor <grin>....
